findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled can allow malicious sites to read sensitive data from the WordPress API endpoint on behalf of authenticated users.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create a malicious webpage that makes XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials. If a logged-in Plex user visits the malicious site, their session cookies will be sent and the API response can be read by the attacker's JavaScript.
